name: Comfortable Darkness
description:
"SofaR" Collection | No.06/15 - "Comfortable Darkness"

"SofaR" is a project that started during a routine visit to a friend, whose apartment had an old leather sofa sitting in the living room corner. The sofa was definitely special and the leather from which it was made created unusual textures. The leather folds of the sofa created different shapes that looked like many figures. It was just required to photograph it from every possible direction. After some editing, these characters just came to life.
